comment: PIPE BOMBER SUSPECT pictured last year with Izzy Hernandez. Sayok does not appear destitute. In addition, why would a Trump enthusiast attend a banquet and have a photo OP with a Democrat Donor/Supporter?

# ::snt PIPE BOMBER SUSPECT pictured last year with Izzy Hernandez. Sayok does not appear destitute. In addition, why would a Trump enthusiast attend a banquet and have a photo OP with a Democrat Donor/Supporter?

                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "PIPE"
                        :op2 "Bomber"
                        :op3 "SUSPECT"))
            :ARG2 (p3 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Izzie"
                        :op2 "Hernandez"))
            :time (y / year
                  :mod (l / last)))
      :snt2 (a / appear-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (d / destitute)
            :ARG2 (p4 / person
                  :name (n3 / name
                        :op1 "Sayok")))
      :snt3 (a2 / and
            :op2 (a3 / and
                  :op1 (a4 / attend-01
                        :ARG0 (p5 / person
                              :ARG0-of (e / enthusiastic-03
                                    :ARG1 (p6 / person
                                          :name (n4 / name
                                                :op1 "Trump"))))
                        :ARG1 (b / banquet))
                  :op2 (h / have-03
                        :ARG0 p5
                        :ARG1 (p7 / photo
                              :mod (o / original))
                        :accompanier (s / slash
                              :op1 (p8 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (d2 / donate-01)
                                    :mod (p9 / political-party
                                          :name (n5 / name
                                                :op1 "Democrat")))
                              :op2 (p10 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (s2 / supply-01))))
                  :ARG1-of (c / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (a5 / amr-unknown)))))
